mapper.select: SELECT i.id AS inboundId , i.expected_date AS expectedDate , i.quantity , i.created_at AS createdAt , i.updated_at AS updatedAt , wsc.warehouseId , wsc.warehouseName , wsc.sectionName , wsc.cellName , IFNULL(s.quantity, 0) AS stockQuantity , p.productId , p.productName , p.mainCategory , p.subCategory , p.detailCategory , p.height , p.width , p.depth , u.id AS userId , u.name AS userName , u.company_name AS companyName , u.email , u.phone FROM Inbound i JOIN (SELECT c.id AS cellId , c.name AS cellName , s.name AS sectionName , w.id AS warehouseId , w.name AS warehouseName FROM Cell c JOIN Section s ON s.id = c.section_id JOIN Warehouse w ON w.id = s.warehouse_id) wsc ON cellId = i.cell_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(s.quantity) AS quantity , s.inbound_id FROM Inbound i JOIN Stock s ON s.inbound_id = i.id WHERE s.type = 1 GROUP BY s.inbound_id) s ON s.inbound_id = i.id JOIN (SELECT p.id AS productId , p.name AS productName , c1.name AS mainCategory , c2.name AS subCategory , c3.name AS detailCategory , p.height , p.width , p.depth FROM Product p LEFT JOIN Category c3 ON c3.id = p.category_id LEFT JOIN Category c2 ON c2.id = c3.parent_category_id LEFT JOIN Category c1 ON c1.id = c2.parent_category_id) p ON p.productId = i.product_id LEFT JOIN User u ON u.id = i.user_id WHERE i.id = #{id};
SELECT status , rejection_reason AS rejectionReason , created_at AS createdAt FROM InboundApproval WHERE inbound_id = #{inboundId}
